name: 旺达·贝内德蒂
name_full: 旺达·贝内德蒂 Wanda Benedetti
birth_place: 意大利，威尼托大区，特雷维索省，特雷维索（Treviso）
introduction: Married to actor Toni Barpi, was an interpreter in the dialect theater comedies of Veneto and worked in Cesco Baseggio company. She also worked for the Teatro di Genova, among others in "Il fu Mattia Pascal" by Luigi Pirandello, in the stage version edited by Tullio Kezich, and in "La foresta" of Aleksandr Nikolaevic Ostrovskij. On television, she starred in several comedy broadcast by Rai for the theater season and appeared in the cast of television dramas.
